metadata.title: Azure Security Fundamentals
metadata.subtitle: Secure your Azure environment and protect against threats
metadata.description: Learn Azure security concepts, best practices, and tools to protect your cloud infrastructure. Prepare for the AZ-500 certification.

overview.summary: Azure Security Fundamentals provides essential knowledge for securing Azure environments. Learn to implement security controls, manage identities, protect against threats, and ensure compliance.
objectives: Understand Azure security concepts and services
overview.targetAudience: Security professionals, IT administrators, and Azure users who want to secure Azure resources and prepare for the AZ-500 certification.

modules.title: Azure Security Concepts
modules.description: Core security concepts and Azure security services

sections.content: Azure provides comprehensive security capabilities to protect your applications, data, and infrastructure from modern threats and attacks.

labs.title: Azure Security Center Setup

modules.title: Identity and Access Management
modules.description: Manage identities and control access to Azure resources

sections.content:
Zero Trust Security Model

Azure implements a Zero Trust approach where no user or device is automatically trusted, and verification is required from everyone trying to access resources.

faq.question: What Azure security services will I learn?
faq.answer: You'll learn about Azure Security Center, Azure AD, Key Vault, Security Information and Event Management (SIEM), and threat protection services.

faq.question: Do I need security experience?
faq.answer: Basic security knowledge is helpful but not required. The course covers security fundamentals and builds from there.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a technical course covering implementation of security controls and best practices in Azure.
